title: NYC Launch of Fashion & Retail Industry Networking Events
desc: Eventsy cordially invites you to celebrate the launch of our Fashion and Retail Industry Networking Events at the Coco Chanel inspired Beautique Restaurant. Join other fashionistas, professionals and industry experts for an evening of networking, mingling and beautifying. All attendees will have the opportunity to receive a make up "makeover" and winter beauty tips. We are also featuring special guests that will give us an exclusive "Sneak Peak" into the upcoming Fashion Week 2016, as well as a recap on this past Fashion Week Month! ?Tuesday, November 24th ?6:30pm-9:30pm ?Beautique - 8 West 58th ?21 and over Chris Collie, Senior Editor for Fashion Week Online Shao Yang, Founder of The Tailory New York Rene Lautrec, Exclusive Designer for LAUTREC Timothy George, Designer
